about_the_game:
Hey! No need to purchase this, is only if you want to support us and that's it!

We made it for people that asked us for a way to gift skins or purchase without Steam Wallet.

Also it helps us to be able to gift skins to our loved ones and add regional price!

Thank you so much for the support already, it's been a fenomenal launch! Can't wait to cook up more content for you guys

PS: If you bought the pack in-game you don't need to buy this!
detailed_description:
Hey! No need to purchase this, is only if you want to support us and that's it!

We made it for people that asked us for a way to gift skins or purchase without Steam Wallet.

Also it helps us to be able to gift skins to our loved ones and add regional price!

Thank you so much for the support already, it's been a fenomenal launch! Can't wait to cook up more content for you guys

PS: If you bought the pack in-game you don't need to buy this!
name: Dodgy Deliveries - Supporters Pack! Skeleton Bike + Pets + All Skins!

package_groups.title: Buy Dodgy Deliveries - Supporters Pack! Skeleton Bike + Pets + All Skins!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD fx 6300, Intel i3 4130
  • Graphics: GTX 750ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600, intel i5 9400f
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Thank you for considering buying the supporters pack!
